introduction: I am dedicated to writing and refactoring clean, reusable, and scalable code in Angular, NodeJS, MongoDB, and ExpressJS applying good practices and development standards.
about: Greetings, I’m Vikrant Pathania, and I’m in an exhilarating journey through the ever-evolving digital landscape. My fascination with technology and problem-solving began early on, but it truly ignited when I discovered the power of web development. I have created various websites and applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Angular, and Node.js, ranging from personal blogs to e-commerce platforms. My goal is to become a full-stack developer and create innovative solutions for real-world problems. I’m always eager to learn new skills and technologies.
